amendatorysection.chaptername: State Uni., State Colleges, and Post. Education
amendatorysection.para: The authority may do all things necessary or convenient to carry out the purposes of the Nebraska Educational Finance Authority Act.

In carrying out the purposes of the act, the authority may undertake a project for two or more private institutions of higher education jointly, or for any combination thereof, and thereupon all other provisions of the act shall apply to and be for the benefit of the authority and such joint participants.
